A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie should be tossed aside and redone...its almost as if the decision makers in this films Egos are so large that they actually thought fans would receive this false portayal of Lukes character in which he's abandoned most if not all of what made Luke..Luke in the OT. It wasn't even believable...it didn't make sense to me and it was a complete slap in the face not only to fans but to Luke Skywalker and Mark Hamill. Aside from that from a story telling standpoint it was painful to watch characters I don't really care about go on a side mission that in the end didn't effect the final outcome. Very sad I am.
